if.if: f.free_title LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR f.free_content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR m.mem_id LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR m.mem_nick LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM free_board f JOIN member m ON f.mem_num=m.mem_num

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM (SELECT f.free_num,
REPLACE(REPLACE(f.free_title,'<','&lt'),'>','>') free_title,
f.free_hit, f.free_fixed, f.free_filename, f.free_regdate, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM free_reply r WHERE r.free_num=f.free_num) f_replyCnt, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM free_fav w WHERE w.free_num=f.free_num) f_favCnt, m.mem_num, m.mem_nick FROM free_board f JOIN member m ON m.mem_num=f.mem_num
ORDER BY f.free_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum>=#{start} AND rnum<=#{end}

SELECT * FROM(SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM(SELECT fre_num,
REPLACE(REPLACE(fre_content,'<','<'),'>','>') fre_content,
fre_regdate, fre_modifydate, free_num, mem_num, mem_id, mem_nick FROM free_reply JOIN member USING (mem_num) WHERE free_num=#{free_num} ORDER BY fre_num DESC)a)
WHERE rnum>=#{start} AND rnum<=#{end}
